name: Sunshine Profits
tag_list: gold, silver, investment, trading, gold-investment, gold-trading, silver-investment, silver-trading, gold-price, silver-price, gold-news, silver-news, precious-metals, gold-reports, gold-articles, silver-reports, silver-articles, silver-analysis, gold-ana
overview:
Sunshine Profits provides tools for gold and silver investments and trading.

The company provides analysis and interactive investment tools (financial software, mostly html5-based) and chart indicators for the precious metals market.

The main section on the SunshineProfits.com websites are:

Investment reports: www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/reports

How-to pages for investment beginners: http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/how-to-buy/ http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/etf/

Educational materials: http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/dictionary/ (investment terms are explained also through dialogs) http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/multimedia/ (investment videos)

Analysis of latest events on the precious metals market, currency markets, stock market: http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/articles/ http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/premium-updates/

Charts: http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/charts/sp-indicators/short-term-charts/

Interactive investment tools: http://www.sunshineprofits.com/gold-silver/investment-tools/

Sunshine Profits’ main editor is Przemyslaw Radomski, CFA.
